ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a guild member who is a 53 necro and he said it can be hard for a necro to find a group. He is usually in Old Sebilis lfg or soloing. I do not know if
ygData.messageBody:
I have a guild member who is a 53 necro and he said it can be hard for a necro to find a group. He is usually in Old Sebilis lfg or soloing. I do not know if this helps just what I know.
-----Original Message-----
From: Rob LeBeau [mailto:rlebeau65@...]
Sent: Friday, February 22, 2002 10:33 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] hi all

It sounds like you are trying to solo. I am no expert
nor do I have a char that high but I have read in
numerous places that once you get high in level you
need to group when hunting.  5 Level 54 people should
do alright, I would imagine.

Hope this helps

--- perth6065 <perth6065@...> wrote:
> Hi all im new here so thought id say a big hello
> ....HELLO
> Im still new to Eq been playing about 7 months now
> and its getting
> tough.Im now level 54 not twinked in the sligest and
> got no place to
> hunt?
> Im not joking the places are too nasty or too easy
> lolol
> I play a gnome necro on the drinal sever all my
> guild are close
> freind and all aussies.Anyway if anone knows a semi
> easy place to
> hunt let me know:)
> thanks
